column5: Hi all, another shore fishing video shot a bit closer to home than the last one. Actually it was shot in our front yard. I have been doing a lot of shore fishing this year so far, really enjoy it. The bite was really 'ON' yesterday evening, the whole clan had a blast and everything went back in, so plenty more if you plan to come up and fish 'The Goon'.Shore Fishing Lake Wabigoon Walleyehttp://youtu.be/jMzsb_xKRrs
